biotools.summary: The package can calculate the indexes for selective stength in codon usage in bacteria species. (1) Calculate the strength of selected codon usage bias based on Paul Sharp's method (comparable among different species). (2) Translational accuracy selection can be inferred from Akashi's test. (3) Optimal codon lists can be calculated by either op_highly function, or op_corre_CodonW/op_corre_NCprime function.

bioschemas.name: sscu
bioschemas.summary: The package can calculate the indexes for selective stength in codon usage in bacteria species. (1) Calculate the strength of selected codon usage bias based on Paul Sharp's method (comparable among different species). (2) Translational accuracy selection can be inferred from Akashi's test. (3) Optimal codon lists can be calculated by either op_highly function, or op_corre_CodonW/op_corre_NCprime function.
